title: Rigatoni with Chunky Meat Sauce
ingredients: 3 cans (14 oz) diced Italian-seasoned tomatoes, drained
directions: In a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat, add the onion and cook until golden.
Add beef and cook until brown.
Transfer mixture to the slow cooker. Stir in tomatoes
Cover. Cook on low for 6 to 8 hours or on high for 3 to 4 hours. Just before done, stir in pepper, pasta, and cheese. Service immediately.
